takes data frame and regular expression and calculates the mean for the given columns. Will take into account exemmptions

get_mean.Rd

takes data frame and regular expression and calculates the mean for the given columns. Will take into account exemmptions

get_mean(df, RE)

Arguments

df

data frame of marks
RE

regular expression to choose columns to average

Value

vector of means

Examples

library(examMarking)
data("SMI_2018_marks")
SMI_2018_marks <-
  SMI_2018_marks %>%
  clean_marks_df("^A") %>%
  get_prop_df("^A", 1)
SMI_2018_marks %>%
  get_mean("^A")
#>  [1] 1.0000000 0.9728814 0.9408927 0.9134033 0.9219486 0.8456078 0.9496018
#>  [8] 0.7363674 0.9385984 0.9735559 0.9898882 0.8950544 0.8403500 0.3896954

#> [22] 0.8857992 0.9432372 1.0000000 0.7915466 0.9319302 0.9403973 0.9558119

#> [43] 0.9890945 0.9789211 0.9303209 0.8837194 0.9249660 0.9240560 0.2630952
